```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(Seurat)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
refquery <- readRDS(here('explore/RDS/07_df.RDS'))
```

```{r}
metadata <- refquery@meta.data
metadata
```

```{r}
write_csv(metadata, "metadata.csv")
```

```{r}
unique(refquery$cell_type_main)
```

```{r}
Immune <- subset(refquery, subset = cell_type_main == "Immune cells")
```

```{r}
saveRDS(Immune, file = "Immune.RDS")
```
